function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate space allocation for social distancing","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among participants","Mitigation":"Re-design the layout to ensure sufficient distancing between participants","Technologies":"Optimization algorithms for space planning","People":"Participants in the meeting or social space","Owner":"Architects or space designers"},{"Description":"Ineffective airflow within physical environments","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Incorporate ventilation and airflow optimization in the design process","Technologies":"HVAC systems, airflow simulation software","People":"Occupants of the physical space","Owner":"Architects or HVAC engineers"}]}
